this_title: threefor100: o ang tamang porma ng pag uukay at iba pang mga bagay-bagay, i think!
trans_title: threefor100: or the thrifting of love and various other thin
introduction: A bored employee in a thrift store gets scolded by the owner for not being proactive enough. Even the fish in the tank are watching the drama unfold.
